/usr/bin/c++   -lgtest -lgtest_main -lglfw -ldl -lGL -g   CMakeFiles/Tests.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Tests.dir/__/lib/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/Tests.dir/__/src/engine/Camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Tests.dir/__/src/engine/Transformation.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Tests.dir/__/src/engine/Object.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Tests.dir/__/src/engine/Window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Tests.dir/__/src/engine/exceptions/WindowException.cpp.o  -o Tests
